What advertising and marketing agencies say about us

Agencies across Canada use the MTM to power data-driven stroytelling - from strategy to exicution.

MTM has become an essential part of our programming and distribution strategy. The depth of audience data allows us to spot shifts before they appear in ratings, helping our teams adjust ad sales and content planning in real time. It’s not just research, it’s intelligence we can act on.

- Role, Org
